text.p: The Shavian alphabet is a simple, memorable, regular alternative to the alphabet we all grew up with. It's been around for nearly fifty years.

ul.li: Click here for a gentle introduction to Shavian.

text.p: After you have learned to Shavian, you might want to

ul.li: read the XKCD comic in Shavian,
the feeds of your favourite in Shavian,
watch a film with Shavian subtitles,
or help translate free software into Shavian.

text.p: If you want some more technical information, you might be interested in the Shavian Set, a system to translate text into Shavian automatically, or in contributing some translations of your own.
There is also an archive of the Shaw Script journal available, and there will be answers to some questions later.
